nodes.text: The Sorannan-class Star Destroyer was a class of Imperial Star Destroyer.

One such ship was the Rakehell, which was used as a weapons and engine-testbed and captured by the Yevetha. It was later recaptured by survivors of the Yevetha occupation and served the Imperial Remnant. The Rakehell was destroyed at the Battle of Anx Minor in 17 ABY, when the New Republic used a weak spot to breach the ship's antimatter containment.
